mapper.select: SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , R.RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.SEND = E.EMP_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND R.RECEIVE=${empNo}

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , R.SEND , R.RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.RECEIVE = E.EMP_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND M.MAIL_NO = ${mailNo} AND R.RECEIVE = ${receive}

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , R.RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.RECEIVE = E.EMP_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND R.RECEIVE=${empNo} AND R.STAR = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(R.READ_YN) FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND R.RECEIVE=${empNo} AND R.READ_YN = 'N'
SELECT MAIL_ATT_NO , MAIL_NO , NAME , ORIGIN_NAME , ENROLL_DATE FROM MAIL_ATT WHERE MAIL_NO = ${mailNo}
